name: EpisodeOfCare
title: EpisodeOfCare
description: An association between a patient and an organization / healthcare provider(s) during which time encounters may occur. The managing organization assumes a level of responsibility for the patient during this time.

elements.name: EpisodeOfCare
elements.description: An association between a patient and an organization / healthcare provider(s) during which time encounters may occur.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: The EpisodeOfCare may be known by different identifiers for different contexts of use, such as when an external agency is tracking the Episode for funding purposes.

elements.name: status
elements.description: planned | waitlist | active | onhold | finished | cancelled.

elements.name: statusHistory
elements.description: The history of statuses that the EpisodeOfCare has been through (without requiring processing the history of the resource).

elements.name: type
elements.description: A classification of the type of episode of care; e.g. specialist referral, disease management, type of funded care.

elements.name: diagnosis
elements.description: The list of diagnosis relevant to this episode of care.

elements.name: patient
elements.description: The patient who is the focus of this episode of care.

elements.name: managingOrganization
elements.description: The organization that has assumed the specific responsibilities for the specified duration.

elements.name: period
elements.description: The interval during which the managing organization assumes the defined responsibility.

elements.name: referralRequest
elements.description: Referral Request(s) that are fulfilled by this EpisodeOfCare, incoming referrals.

elements.name: careManager
elements.description: The practitioner that is the care manager/care coordinator for this patient.

elements.name: team
elements.description: The list of practitioners that may be facilitating this episode of care for specific purposes.

elements.name: account
elements.description: The set of accounts that may be used for billing for this EpisodeOfCare.
